meanings.sent1: The flowers bloomed aplenty in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She found apples aplenty at the orchard.
meanings.sent3: The cookies disappeared aplenty at the party.
meanings.sent4: Laughter echoed aplenty in the comedy club.
meanings.sent5: The stars twinkled aplenty in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Existing or available in large quantities.
meanings.sent1: There were books aplenty on the shelves.
meanings.sent2: The store had toys aplenty for the children.
meanings.sent3: The buffet offered choices aplenty for the guests.
meanings.sent4: The forest was filled with trees aplenty.
meanings.sent5: The market stalls displayed fruits aplenty.
